nodes.text: Orb Telorn was a Jedi archivist who lived during the Great Sith War.

Sometime after the Battle of Foerost, Telorn and his apprentice Dace Vinagar encountered a group of adventurers, said to be time travelers. He helped them search for information about a legendary Sith Lord, Ku'ar Danar, whose tomb was found by Sli'Lon Tahar.

The Jedi Order, however, was not inclined to trust those adventurers and jailed them for interrogation. But Telorn, with the help of his apprentice, managed to free them. Vinagar then participated to an expedition in the search of the Sith tomb, in the Nilrebmah system.
